replenishmentAmount.description: If you have enough amount in the source token, you can set bigger replenishment amount in order to submit transactions less frequently, hence pay less for gas.
replenishmentAmount.label: Replenishment amount

sourceTokenAddress.description: The balance will be replenished by swapping this token.
sourceTokenAddress.label: Replenish from

threshold.description: The minimum balance of the token you will have. When the balance gets less than this value it will be replenished by swapping the source token.
threshold.label: Minimum balance

watchedTokenAddress.description: Your balance of this token will be watched and replenished when it's about to run out.
watchedTokenAddress.label: Token to replenish

index.description: Don't let your account run out of fuel! Replenish your crypto assets' balance automatically by swapping ERC20 token of your choice
index.title: refuel

status.waiting: WalletConnect Sign Client is not initialized
